card.name: Aggression
card.property: While you have initiative, each Dwarf is damage +1. Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to draw X cards. Discard this condition.

card.name: Battle in Earnest
card.property: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to place X wounds on minions.

card.name: Blood Runs Chill
card.property: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X and exert that Dwarf twice to make an opponent discard X Shadow cards.

card.name: Counts But One
card.property: If Gimli is not assigned to a skirmish, add a threat to have him replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.name: Gimli
card.property: Damage +1. For each wound on Gimli, he is strength +1 and damage +1.

card.name: Honed
card.property: Spot a Dwarf who is damage +X to make him strength +X.

card.name: Unheard of
card.property: If a Dwarf who is damage +X wins a skirmish, wound a minion not assigned to a skirmish X times.

card.name: Wish For Our Kinfolk
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion and either an [Elven] companion or a [Gondor] Man to add a [Dwarven] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Dwarven] token here to make a companion damage +1.

card.name: A Grey Ship
card.property: Spot an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to heal X unbound companions. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.name: Legolas
card.property: Archer. While you can spot 3 wounded minions, each minion skirmishing Legolas is strength -3.

card.name: Life of the Eldar
card.property: To play, spot 2 Elves. Discard an Elf to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Reckless We Rode
card.property: Exert an Elf companion and make the fellowship archery total -X (to a minimum of 0) to wound a minion X times. You cannot use archery special abilities.

card.name: Shake Off the Shadow
card.property: Fellowship: Exert an Elf companion and either a [Gandalf] companion or a [Dwarven] companion to add an [Elven] token here. Archery: Remove an [Elven] token here to make the fellowship archery total +1 (limit +2).

card.name: A Fool
card.property: At sites 1K to 5K, heal Gandalf. At any other site, prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: When Gandalf is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Gandalf
card.property: When Gandalf is in your starting fellowship, his twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Let Us Not Tarry
card.property: Exert Gandalf to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -1 for each Gandalf signet you spot.

card.name: Mighty Steed
card.property: If Gandalf is not assigned to a skirmish, spot Shadowfax or exert Gandalf to have Gandalf replace an unbound companion in a skirmish.

card.name: Not the First Halfling
card.property: Fellowship: Exert Gandalf and either an [Elven] companion or a [Shire] companion to add a [Gandalf] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Gandalf] token here to make a minion skirmishing an unbound companion strength -2.

card.name: On Your Doorstep
card.property: Spot Gandalf and exert a companion to place a card of that companion's culture from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Saved From the Fire
card.property: Spot Gandalf and place a companion (except the Ring-bearer) in the dead pile to take 3 cards from that companion's culture into hand from your draw deck. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Shadowfax
card.property: Bearer must be Gandalf. At the start of each skirmish involving Gandalf, each minion skirmishing Gandalf must exert. Skirmish: Add a threat to make Gandalf strength +1.

card.name: Hidden Even From Her
card.property: Gollum is fierce. Shadow: Spot 6 companions to play Gollum from your discard pile and exert a companion. Place this condition on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Larder
card.property: To play, spot a [Gollum] minion. Regroup: Discard an Orc from hand to add a [Gollum] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Gollum] token here to make Shelob strength +3 (limit +6).

card.name: Promise Keeping
card.property: Each time a companion takes a wound during a skirmish that involves a [Gollum] minion, exert a companion.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Fierce. When you play Shelob, you may play a [Gollum] possession from your draw deck. Shelob is strength +3 for each minion stacked on a [Gollum] possession.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Fierce. When you play Shelob, you may play a [Gollum] possession from your draw deck. Shelob is strength +3 for each minion stacked on a [Gollum] possession.

card.name: Shelob
card.property: Enduring. Fierce. While in a fierce skirmish, Shelob is damage +1.

card.name: Smeagol
card.property: Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Add threats equal to the total vitality of the minions Smeagol is skirmishing to discard Smeagol. Regroup: Discard Smeagol to take a [Gollum] minion from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Spider Poison
card.property: Skirmish: Remove a threat or a burden to transfer this possession to a companion skirmishing Shelob. Each time bearer is assigned to a skirmish, bearer must exert.

card.name: Still Far Ahead
card.property: Spot Smeagol to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). The Shadow number of the fellowship's next site is -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Web
card.property: Regroup: If there are fewer than 3 cards stacked here, spot your Orc or [Gollum] minion to stack that minion here. Shadow: Play a [Gollum] minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: At His Command
card.property: Exert Aragorn to make an unbound companion with the Aragorn signet strength +1 for each threat you spot.

card.name: Catapult
card.property: To play, spot 2 [Gondor] knights. Maneuver: Discard 2 cards from hand to reveal the top card of an opponent's draw deck. Choose an opponent who must discard a Shadow card that has a twilight cost that is the same as the twilight cost of the revealed card.

card.name: Elessar's Edict
card.property: If a [Gondor] Wraith is about to be killed, discard him and either exhaust another [Gondor] Wraith or spot another exhausted [Gondor] Wraith to prevent that.

card.name: Faramir
card.property: Knight. When you play Faramir (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play a knight revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Fourth Level
card.property: Fortification. Skirmish: Exert 2 [Gondor] Men or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man. Exhaust that minion.

card.name: Garrison of Gondor
card.property: Archer. Knight. To play, spot 3 [Gondor] companions. While you can spot a fortification, Garrison of Gondor is defender +1.

card.name: Imrahil
card.property: Knight. To play, spot a knight. Each time Imrahil wins a skirmish, you may exert 2 minions.

card.name: King of the Dead
card.property: Enduring. To play, spot a [Gondor] Wraith and add 2 threats. Response: If Aragorn is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert King of the Dead to prevent that wound.

card.name: King of the Dead
card.property: Enduring. To play, spot a [Gondor] Wraith and add 2 threats. Response: If Aragorn is about to take a wound in a skirmish, exert King of the Dead to prevent that wound.

card.name: Knight of Dol Amroth
card.property: Knight. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Knight's Mount
card.property: Bearer must be a knight. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion who is not assigned to a skirmish.

card.name: Oathbreaker
card.property: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to discard a possession borne by a minion skirmishing this companion.

card.name: A Path Appointed
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a [Gondor] Man and either a [Dwarven] companion or a [Rohan] companion to add a [Gondor] token here. Regroup: Remove a [Gondor] token here to discard a minion.

card.name: Shadow Host
card.property: Enduring. To play, spot 2 exhausted [Gondor] Wraiths and add 2 threats. While Shadow Host is exhausted, it is defender +1.

card.name: Sixth Level
card.property: Fortification. Regroup: Exert a [Gondor] Man to play a [Gondor] fortification from your discard pile (limit 1).

card.name: Sleepless Dead
card.property: Enduring. To play, add a threat. Each time this companion wins a skirmish, you may exert him to discard a minion he is skirmishing.

card.name: Spectral Sword
card.property: Bearer must be a [Gondor] Wraith. Skirmish: Discard 3 cards from hand to heal bearer.

card.name: Stronger and More Terrible
card.property: To play, add a threat. Each time your [Gondor] Wraith wins a skirmish, you may remove a threat.

card.name: Swept Away
card.property: Each time the fellowship moves, add a threat or discard this condition. While you have initiative, exhausted [Gondor] Wraiths cannot take wounds.

card.name: Black Numenorean
card.property: Corsair. Fierce. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a [Raider] token to discard a possession borne by a character skirmishing this minion.

card.name: Black Sails of Umbar
card.property: When you play this possession, you may add a [Raider] token here. Shadow: Remove X [Raider] tokens here to play a corsair from your discard pile; its twilight cost is -X. Discard this possession.

card.name: Castamir of Umbar
card.property: Corsair. Enduring. Fierce. Shadow: Exert Castamir of Umbar and play a corsair to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Castamir of Umbar
card.property: Corsair. Enduring. Fierce. Shadow: Exert Castamir of Umbar and play a corsair to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Ballista
card.property: Bearer must be a corsair. While you have initiative, bearer is an archer and fierce.

card.name: Corsair Buccaneer
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove a threat to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Freebooter
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may remove 2 culture tokens to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Gunners
card.property: Corsair. Skirmish: If you have initiative, remove a [Raider] token to make a corsair fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Corsair Lookout
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you have initiative, you may discard an ally to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Marauder
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you can spot another corsair, you may discard a possession to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Marauder
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, if you can spot another corsair, you may discard a possession to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair Plunderer
card.property: Corsair. When you play this minion, you may discard 2 cards from hand to add 2 [Raider] tokens to a card that already has a [Raider] token on it.

card.name: Corsair War Galley
card.property: When you play this possession, you may add a [Raider] token here. While you can spot 6 [Raider] tokens and a [Raider] Man, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Regroup: Add (1) for each [Raider] token you can spot. Discard this possession.

card.name: Haradrim Marksman
card.property: Southron. Archer. While you can spot another [Raider] Man, Ring-bound companions cannot take archery wounds.

card.name: Haradwaith
card.property: While you can spot a [Raider] minion at site 4K, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a [Raider] card from hand to add (5). Discard this condition.

card.name: Heavy Axeman
card.property: Easterling. While you can spot 4 burdens, Heavy Axeman is strength +4 and fierce.

card.name: Line of Defense
card.property: While you can spot a mounted [Raider] Man, [Raider] Men cannot take wounds (except during skirmishes).

card.name: Mumakil
card.property: Bearer must be a Southron. Bearer is fierce. While you have initiative or can spot 4 threats, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: Ships of Great Draught
card.property: Shadow: Remove a threat or discard a [Raider] card from hand to add a [Raider] token here. Regroup: Remove 2 [Raider] tokens here to place a [Raider] card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Wind That Sped Ships
card.property: Make a corsair strength +1 for each [Raider] token you spot (limit +6). If you have initiative, you may place this event on top of your draw deck.

card.name: Between Nazgul and Prey
card.property: Exert an enduring [Wraith] minion twice to assign that minion to an unbound companion.

card.name: Beyond All Darkness
card.property: Exert a Nazgul to make him strength +2 and damage +1. If the character he is skirmishing is killed, the Free Peoples player must place his or her hand beneath his or her draw deck.

card.name: Black Dart
card.property: Archery: Spot your enduring or mounted Nazgul to transfer this condition from your support area to an unbound companion. Discard a mount borne by that companion. Bearer cannot heal or bear mounts.

card.name: Black Flail
card.property: Bearer must be a Nazgul. Skirmish: If bearer is The Witch-king, exert him and spot a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing to discard that possession.

card.name: Flung Into the Fray
card.property: When you play a minion stacked here, you may exert a companion. Regroup: If no minion is stacked here, spot your [Wraith] minon to stack it here. Shadow: Spot 2 [Wraith] minions to play a [Wraith] minion stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: Gothmog
card.property: While you have initiative, each [Wraith] minion is an archer.

card.name: Mastered By Madness
card.property: Make a Nazgul strength +2. If that Nazgul wins this skirmish, you may discard a Free Peoples mount.

card.name: Morgul Ambusher
card.property: While you can spot 3 threats, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Creeper
card.property: While you can spot 3 burdens, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Lurker
card.property: While you have initiative, the minion archery total is +2.

card.name: Morgul Squealer
card.property: Shadow: Discard this minion to play a [Wraith] minion from your discard pile. Shadow: Spot 6 companions and discard this minion to play up to 2 [Wraith] minions from your draw deck; their twilight costs are each -1.

card.name: Streaming to the Field
card.property: For each [Wraith] Orc you can spot, the Free Peoples player must have an additional card in hand to have initiative. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make a [Wraith] Orc strength +2.

card.name: Ulaire Attea
card.property: Enduring. Regroup: Exert Ulaire Attea and spot your [Wraith] minion to return that minion to your hand.

card.name: Ulaire Nertea
card.property: Enduring. Fierce. The site number of each [Wraith] minion is -1.

card.name: Ulaire Otsea
card.property: Enduring. Fierce. Regroup: Discard Ulaire Otsea to add (X), where X is the current site number.

card.name: Unhindered
card.property: Make a Nazgul strength +2. If that Nazgul wins this skirmish, the Shadow has initiative until the end of the turn, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand.

card.name: Winged Mount
card.property: To play, discard 2 cards from hand. Bearer must be a Nazgul. Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, remove a threat to prevent that wound.

card.name: The Witch-king
card.property: Enduring. Each Man skirmishing The Witch-king loses all strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Charged Headlong
card.property: If you have initiative, discard a [Rohan] possession to play a [Rohan] possession from your discard pile.

card.name: Doom Drove Them
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a [Rohan] companion and either a [Gondor] Man or a [Shire] companion to add a [Rohan] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Rohan] token here to exert a minion skirmishing a companion.

card.name: Eomer
card.property: Valiant. When you play Eomer (except in your starting fellowship), you may reveal the top 10 cards of your draw deck. You may play each [Rohan] possession revealed. Shuffle your draw deck.

card.name: Eowyn's Shield
card.property: Bearer must be a [Rohan] Man. The minion archery total is -1. Skirmish: If bearer is Eowyn, add a threat and discard Eowyn's Shield to discard a hand weapon borne by a minion she is skirmishing.

card.name: Fury of the Northmen
card.property: Exert a minion skirmishing a mounted [Rohan] Man.

card.name: No Living Man
card.property: Exert Theoden to exert a minion for each Theoden signet you spot.

card.name: Rohirrim Army
card.property: To play, spot 3 [Rohan] companions. You may play Rohirrim Army any time you could play a regroup event. When you play Rohirrim Army, you may discard a minion.

card.name: Theoden
card.property: Valiant. While you can spot a [Rohan] Man, Theoden's twilight cost is -1. When Theoden is killed, you may play a [Rohan] companion from your discard pile or draw deck.

card.name: Called Away
card.property: Regroup: Discard a [Sauron] minion, spot a companion (except the Ring-bearer), and remove X burdens, where X is that companion's vitality, to return that companion to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gorgoroth Agitator
card.property: Besieger. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. When you play this minion, if you can spot another besieger, you may add a threat for each companion over 4. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a [Sauron] engine from your discard pile.

card.name: Gorgoroth Assassin
card.property: Besieger. Assignment: Spot a [Sauron] engine or a site you control to assign this minion to an unbound companion.

card.name: Gorgoroth Berserker
card.property: Besieger. Enduring. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. Maneuver: If you have initiative, exert this minion twice to take control of a site. Maneuver: Remove a threat and exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.name: Gorgoroth Breaker
card.property: Besieger. Archery: Exert this minion or stack it on a site you control to make the fellowship archery total -2.

card.name: Gorgoroth Looter
card.property: Besieger. When you play this minion, you may remove a burden to play a besieger stacked on a site you control.

card.name: Gorgoroth Patrol
card.property: Besieger. Regroup: If this minion is stacked on a site you control, discard this minion to make the move limit for this turn -1.

card.name: Gorgoroth Servitor
card.property: Besieger. Archery: Return this minion to your hand to make the fellowship archery total -2 and prevent the Free Peoples player from using archery special abilities.

card.name: Gorgoroth Stormer
card.property: Besieger. Shadow: If you have initiative, exert this minion to add a burden and make the Free Peoples player draw a card.

card.name: Great Hill Troll
card.property: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -1 for each [Sauron] engine you spot. When you play this minion at sites 5K to 9K, you may discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Grond
card.property: Engine. Shadow: Play a [Sauron] minion to add a [Sauron] token here. Regroup: Remove X [Sauron] tokens here to discard a Free Peoples card (except a companion) with a twilight cost of X. Discard a [Sauron] minion or this possession.

card.name: Grond
card.property: Engine. Shadow: Play a [Sauron] minion to add a [Sauron] token here. Regroup: Remove X [Sauron] tokens here to discard a Free Peoples card (except a companion) with a twilight cost of X. Discard a [Sauron] minion or this possession.

card.name: Morgai
card.property: While you can spot a [Sauron] minion at site 5K, the Shadow has initiative, regardless of the Free Peoples player's hand. Response: If a companion is played, discard a [Sauron] card from hand to take control of a site. Discard this condition.

card.name: Olog-hai of Mordor
card.property: Besieger. Fierce. The twilight cost of this minion is -2 for each [Sauron] minion stacked on a site. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, you may play a besieger stacked on a site you control. That besieger is fierce and damage +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Siege Troop
card.property: Besieger. Regroup: Exert this minion twice to take control of a site.

card.name: Their Marching Companies
card.property: Engine. To play, spot a [Sauron] minion. Regroup: Remove a threat to stack your [Sauron] minion on a site you control. Shadow: Remove a threat to play a [Sauron] minion stacked on a site you control.

card.name: Troll of Gorgoroth
card.property: Besieger. Fierce. To play, spot a [Sauron] Orc. The twilight cost of Troll of Gorgoroth is -2 for each [Sauron] engine you spot. Regroup: Exert Troll of Gorgoroth to stack your besieger on a site you control.

card.name: Closer and Closer He Bent
card.property: Regroup: Exert an unbound Hobbit and add a burden to reveal your hand. Place each Free Peoples card revealed this way beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Morgai Foothills
card.property: When the fellowship moves from site 4K, remove (1) for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Regroup: Discard a card from hand for each Ring-bound companion you spot. Discard this condition.

card.name: So Fair
card.property: If the Shadow has initiative, add a threat to make an unbound Hobbit strength +1 for each [Shire] card you spot.

card.name: Song of the Shire
card.property: Fellowship: Exert a [Shire] companion and either a [Rohan] companion or a [Gandalf] companion to add a [Shire] token here. Skirmish: Remove a [Shire] token here to prevent an unbound companion from being overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Sting
card.property: Bearer must be Frodo or Sam. Response: If a fierce skirmish involving bearer is about to end, add a threat to discard a minion involved in that skirmish.

card.name: Straining Towards Us
card.property: Exert Frodo to remove (1) for each Frodo signet you spot.

card.name: Unheeded
card.property: If a minion exerts, exert an unbound Hobbit to wound that minion.

card.name: We Shall Meet Again Soon
card.property: If the fellowship moves during the regroup phase, exert an unbound Hobbit to place a Shadow card from your discard pile on top of your draw deck.

card.name: The Dimholt
card.property: Sanctuary. Underground. Fellowship: Add 3 threats to play an enduring companion from your draw deck.

card.name: City of the Dead
card.property: Underground. Shadow: Remove 2 burdens to play an enduring minion from your draw deck or discard pile.

card.name: Crashed Gate
card.property: At the start of the regroup phase, the Free Peoples player must add 3 threats or choose an opponent who may take control of a site.

card.name: Osgiliath Channel
card.property: River. Regroup: Spot your minion and 6 companions to make the Free Peoples player choose to move again this turn.

card.name: Merry
card.property: To play, spot a [Rohan] companion. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to make Merry strength +2 for each [Rohan] companion you spot.

card.name: Pippin
card.property: To play, spot a [Gondor] Man. Skirmish: Discard 4 cards from hand to wound a minion Pippin is skirmishing twice if that minion bears a fortification.
